mapper.select: select a.*,b.auth_name,c.role_id from T_SYS_MENU_AUTH a inner join T_SYS_AUTH b on a.auth_id=b.id left outer join T_SYS_ROLE_MENU_AUTH c on c.menu_auth_id=a.id and c.role_id=#{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select a.auth_name,a.id,b.url,b.menu_id from T_SYS_AUTH a left outer join T_SYS_MENU_AUTH b on b.auth_id=a.id and b.menu_id=#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by a.id asc

select a.*,b.auth_name from T_SYS_MENU_AUTH a inner join T_SYS_AUTH b on a.auth_id=b.id and a.id in(select c.menu_auth_id from T_SYS_ROLE_MENU_AUTH c where c.role_id in ( select role_id from T_SYS_USER_ROLE s inner join T_SYS_ROLE r on s.role_id=r.id and r.status=1 and s.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} ) )
